verses.name: 1 Kings 9:13
verses.text: And he said, What cities are these which thou hast given me, my brother? And he called them the land of Cabul unto this day.

verses.name: 1 Kings 9:14
verses.text: And Hiram sent to the king sixscore talents of gold.

verses.name: 1 Kings 9:15
verses.text: And this is the reason of the levy which king Solomon raised; for to build the house of the Lord, and his own house, and Millo, and the wall of Jerusalem, and Hazor, and Megiddo, and Gezer.
